about_the_game:
Customize your truck with your country flag! A choice of four unique paint jobs will come handy if you feel you need to show your affiliation...

  • Berlin Sights
  • Black, Red and Gold
  • German Fan Ribbon
  • German Flag Decal

All of these themes are applicable to any in-game truck except for 8x4 chassis configurations.
detailed_description:
Customize your truck with your country flag! A choice of four unique paint jobs will come handy if you feel you need to show your affiliation...

  • Berlin Sights
  • Black, Red and Gold
  • German Fan Ribbon
  • German Flag Decal

All of these themes are applicable to any in-game truck except for 8x4 chassis configurations.
legal_notice: (C) 2014 SCS Software. All brand names, trademarks, registered marks, logos, and symbols on vehicles in the game are property of their rightful owners. Used with kind permission.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (2 GB)
  • Storage: 10 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10 (Yosemite)
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (Intel HD 5300)
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
